channel.title: Help please, really desprit
channel.description:
when i close my runserver i get an error when i re-open it on one of my scources saying..
Error: unable to startup listener on port 5555 - port already in use? Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberformatException: For input string: "3340 3159 9632 0 9633 3158 9631 2 Newnpc" at java.lang.numberformatexception.forinputstring(unknown scource) at java.lang.integer.parse.int(unkown scource) at npchandler.loadAustospawn (npchandler.java:1436) at npchandler.(init)(npchandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27) Press any key to continue . . .
please help me i know how to fix the port thing by restarting my computer but it gets a bit annoying becuase it keeps on happening and the second error is in my autospawn when i tried adding npcs but i need the npcs. please help if you can!! :confused: :confused: and i would be really greatful if you could

Read full topic

item.title: Help please, really desprit
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

If your port is already in use,

Close your Mopar client.
Close your runserver.
Open up your runserver.
Open up your Mopar client.

Read full topic

@mitchtheblonde wrote:

go to autospawn.cfg, and go to bottom of list. U should see the npc string and at teh end the Newnpc thing. Delete that whole thing line.

item.title: Help please, really desprit

item.description:

when i close my runserver i get an error when i re-open it on one of my scources saying…

Error: unable to startup listener on port 5555 - port already in use?
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberformatException: For input string: “3340 3159 9632 0 9633 3158 9631 2 Newnpc”
